Reviews.Title: Good Tablet 2740p, used
Reviews.Author: Kim Geo Sung "gskim"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this used 2740p at a wonderful price.It was great item in the original box with some minor scratches.Highly recommended...

Reviews.Title: Don't be an idiot and buy this model with Win7
Reviews.Author: Joseph Powell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Tablet PC with Windows 7 Pro installed. When I received the machine it had Windows XP installed and a Win7 DVD in the box. Duh! There is no DVD player in this tablet, so I would have had to then order an external USB DVD player to upgrade the OS. I returned the unit for a full refund. Amazon's customer service was above and beyond outstanding.
